body:
Comment 12: 
Anyone care to verify that these two installer work without flipping the Security switch
on OS X Lion? (Works for me.)

http://code.google.com/p/go/downloads/detail?name=go1.0.3.darwin-386-signed.pkg
http://code.google.com/p/go/downloads/detail?name=go1.0.3.darwin-amd64-signed.pkg
_Status changed to **Fixed**._
